reviews.review_msg: Sheree is very caring and nice. She really wants her students to succeed. She responds to emails ASAP and is very approachable and understanding. She sets up the class as clearly as possible with a detailed assessment rubric; Follow her rubrics closely to get full marks.

she's so caring, accessible, kind, etc. she really wants all her students to succeed and it shows. 100% recommend taking a course with her. i really struggle with math but having a professor like her made the experience better :)

^ also group projects, clear grading, respected, and caring. The best prof I had at sfu! She is 24/7 here to help you out and can very patiently explaining the same questions for times. I could genuinely feel how passionate she wanted us to learn. An absolute new and interesting math learning experience. Overall easy A & 10/10 course to recommend.
Sheree is an amazing and caring prof. She truly wants everyone to do well and she makes math so fun. She responds to your emailed questions so quickly and makes lectures enjoyably. Highly recommend

Sheree is one of the best professors I have EVER had. I really recommend taking this class with her. The math in this course is nothing like high school, it is SO MUCH FUN. She is also one of the most inspirational and hardworking professors. Always ready to help her students outside of class and sets her student up for success!

Sheree is easily the best professor I've had. Online school is difficult, but she creates the most caring, collaborative online classroom environment. I would absolutely recommend this class to anyone looking to branch out or get extra credits. The assignments are straightforward, including the group project which was a delight. Thank you, Sheree!

Sheree is a wonderful prof. I despised math before I took this class and now I actually enjoy parts of it. The class is fun and engaging. You learn a lot about how math related to art and the world around you. I highly recommend taking this course.

Sheree is an absolutely amazing professor. Taking EDUC 212 has been a great opportunity. I'm not in an Education degree and I've never loved math, but Sheree found a way to make me smile and enjoy learning, every single class. She is realistic, inspirational, and accommodating. The course structure was well-planned. I will take this class with me.
Take her class, you won't go wrong with it.
